name: Linc.
headline: AI Copilot for Shippers, Carriers and Brokers
description: Linc is an AI agent to automate workflows in logistics. Our first product is an AI Copilot for logistics vendors that parses inbound (emails + documents + spreadsheets) and syncs this data with systems of record (ERPs/spreadsheets).

founders.name: Rahul Prakash, Founder
founders.description: Solving hard problems @ Linc AI. Interested in algorithms, data and ML.

founders.name: Shrey Sambhwani, Founder
founders.description: Automating logistics data integrations @ Linc AI. Passionate about AI and the supply chain economy.

founders.name: Harshavardhan Srijay, Founder
founders.description: Building Linc AI. Interested in AI and decision-making.

generated_description:
### Linc: Your AI Copilot for Logistics 

**Overview**  
Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator’s S23 batch, Linc is on a mission to revolutionize the logistics industry by acting as an AI copilot for shippers, carriers, and brokers. The company, located in an undisclosed area with a team of just 3 employees, develops automation tools that reduce manual data entry and streamline workflows in logistics.

**Product Offering**  
Linc's flagship product is an AI agent designed to parse various forms of inbound data—emails, documents, and spreadsheets—and synchronize this information with existing systems of record like ERPs and spreadsheets. This means logistics professionals can spend less time on tedious data entry and more time focusing on growth and operational efficiency.

Here are some key features:  
- **Eliminate Manual Data Entry**: Instantly extract data from documents and email and sync it with your existing systems.
- **User-Friendly API**: Users can upload files, define data schemas, and see results in real-time.
- **Support for Various Document Types**: Whether it’s transport management documents or safety compliance forms, Linc is built to handle it all.

**Impact**  
By automating 0-10% of data entry tasks, Linc claims to help users regain 0-7 hours per day, significantly reduce operating costs, and improve data quality. This kind of efficiency is not just a nice-to-have; it’s essential in today’s fast-paced logistics environment.

**Contact and Further Learning**  
If you’re intrigued by what Linc offers and keen on a live demo, you can check out their website [here](https://www.linc-ai.com/) or reach out via email at founders@linc-ai.com. Their aim is simple: to supercharge your growth with smart automation tools that save time and resources.

### Conclusion  
In an industry marred by inefficiencies, Linc stands out by leveraging AI to tackle the most mundane yet critical tasks in logistics workflows. Their focus on automation isn’t just about keeping up with the industry; it’s about setting a new standard for what efficient logistics can and should look like. If you’re in logistics and haven’t yet looked into Linc, it’s worth your time.
